a 15078 15726    0  +  10  =  10
a 15726 16365    10  +  10  =  20
a 16365 16997    20  +  10  =  30
a 16997 17637    30  +  10  =  40
a 17637 18278    40  +  10  =  50
a 18278 18926    50  +  10  =  60
a 18926 19565    60  +  10  =  70
a 19565 26305    70  +  90000  =  90070
a 18716 19355    90070  +  10  =  90080
a 19355 26307    90080  +  90000  =  180080
a 19174 19822    180080  +  10  =  180090
a 19822 26308    180090  +  90000  =  270090
